tackle.name: Tackle
tackle.description: The user charges into the target.

firespit.name: Fire Spit
firespit.description: The user spits fire at their opponent.

meteor.name: Meteor
meteor.description: The user summons a fireball from the sky.

splash.name: Splash
splash.description: The user flails around in water. Not exactly useless anymore.

watercannon.name: Water Cannon
watercannon.description: The user fires a stream of water at the target.

quickbite.name: Quick Bite
quickbite.description: The user attacks with sharp teeth.

gustofwind.name: Gust of Wind
gustofwind.description: The user whips up sand and dust, causing damage to their target.

babyeyes.name: Baby Eyes
babyeyes.description: The user emphasizes their large eyes, causing the target to waver.

mindovermatter.name: Mind Over Matter
mindovermatter.description: The user damages their target with the power of their mind.

babyfat.name: Baby Fat
babyfat.desciption: The user puffs up their body to defend against damage.

flurryofblows.name: Flurry Of Blows
flurryofblows.description: The user attacks with a large number of light hits.

swoop.name: Swoop
swoop.description: The user attacks the target from high above.

razorblades.name: Razorblades
razorblades.description: The user attacks with a large number of flying razors.

dust.name: Dust
dust.description: The user decreases the target's physical attack.

flash.name: Flash
flash.description: The user creates a bright blast of light that blinds the target.

thunderclap.name: Thunderclap
thunderclap.description: The user creates a monumental sound that deafens the target.

makedark.name: Make Dark
makedark.description: The user covers their eyes and falls asleep, healing some damage.

shadowball.name: Shadow Ball
shadowball.description: The user summons a ball of darkness and hurls it at the target.

forcedevolution.name: Forced Evolution
forcedevolution.description: The user's mind and body are pushed beyond their limit, causing them great pain.
